author: Unity
description:
Unity and Epic Games are advancing the open, interoperable future for video gaming. Announced at Unite 2025, developers will be able to bring Unity games to Fortnite and use Unity’s enhanced cross-platform commerce platform with Unreal Engine, creating more choice and value for the industry.

Unite 2025 puts developer choice and flexibility at the center of game development. Discover how developers can develop, deploy, and grow games across every platform in one trusted environment.

Develop: Unity Core Standards deliver enhanced security, Unity 6 Production Verification sets a new standard of quality, and Unity Studio (now in open beta) enables browser-based authoring for greater collaboration. The Unity AI Gateway will provide secure integration for third-party AI agents.

Deploy: Platform Toolkit streamlines multi-platform publishing. Developer Data Framework provides deeper, actionable insight and more control over game data.

Grow: New enhancements to Unity's native In-App Purcha
title: Unite 2025 Keynote | Barcelona

author: Unity
description:
Celebrate the creators pushing the boundaries of interactive experiences in the Unity Awards! With over 100 standout projects nominated across multiple categories, your voice helps decide who takes top honors. Don’t miss out, votes close on November 21st, and the community’s choice can make all the difference. Plus, save the date: December 2nd is the Unity Showcase, where we’ll announce all the winners.

Explore the nominees and cast your vote now at https://on.unity.com/awards

#UnityAwards #MadeWithUnity #GameDev #IndieDev #VoteNow #Unity
title: 17th Annual Unity Awards

author: Unity
description:
Developers around the world will be able to bring their games to Fortnite while Unity’s cross-platform commerce platform is coming to Unreal Engine soon. When ecosystems are open, everyone wins! 

#MadeWithUnity #UnrealEngine #UnityTechnologies #EpicGames #Fortnite
title: Unity 🤝 Epic Games

author: Unity
description:
Unity President and CEO, Matthew Bromberg, and Epic Games Founder and CEO, Tim Sweeney, took the stage to unveil a new collaboration designed to bring Unity games into Fortnite, creating more opportunity and value for players and developers.

Developers will have the ability to publish Unity games into Fortnite, one of the world’s largest gaming ecosystems with more than 500 million registered accounts worldwide, and participate in the Fortnite Creator Economy. 

Unity will also be bringing Unreal Engine support to their cross-platform commerce platform. This will give Unreal developers more choice for managing everything from their digital catalogs and payment providers to web shops across PC, mobile, and web. 

This Unity and Epic Games/Unreal Engine partnership will have more details released next year.

Learn more here: https://unity.com/news/unity-and-epic-games-together-advance-open-interoperable-future-video-gaming

#Unity #Unite2025 #EpicGames #UnrealEngine #GameDev #MadeWithU
title: Unity and Epic Games Announcement | Unite 2025 Barcelona
